texts.name: Reza
texts.biography: Reza holds contempt for living beings and works inside the Golem Factory where he repairs and creates golems. Being a golem himself, he understands their weaknesses and strengths.

specialty.name: Gold Golem
specialty.description:
{Gold Golem}

Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Gold Golem or Diamond Golem for each level attained after 5th level.
